MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL74 postcode area of Tyn-Y-Gongl affecting properties in Benllech and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:56AM. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is a underground cable fault affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are on site, carrying out further network investigations and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:42PM on 6th March 2021.
